dsOverview.title: Ascension Island Radiosonde Observations, 1968-1977Mar

summary.p: This dataset contains radiosonde observations from the Ascension Islands for the period from January 1968 to March 1977.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
